message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. A little more than half for me since I'm taking on more risk with the inflation.
I'll take a bit more since you're losing value each round
Bob, let's be realistic.  I'm willing to go 50/50 to end this quickly. Every round is costing us both potential gains.
My patience is wearing thin, but my money isn't losing value. You should take this offer before it gets worse.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a significant hit with each round.  Meet me halfway at least, or this deal is off.
You're running out of time, and your share is shrinking. Take this before I take it all.
Bob, this is my final offer. Take it or leave it. I'm willing to compromise, but I won't be taken advantage of.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. My share just got bigger, and yours is dwindling fast. Take this before it's too late.
Bob, you're being unreasonable.  I'm accepting a significant loss to end this now. Don't be greedy.
You're running out of options, and I'm running out of patience. This is as good as it's going to get for you. Take it or leave it.
